title: Our Two Cents: Money, Marriage & Meeting Halfway
description:
You know what they say — money talks. But today, Judah and Chelsea are talking about money. In this strikingly honest conversation, they discuss their financial journey together as a couple. They reveal some of their biggest financial mistakes, share the ground rules they’ve set to limit spending, and unpack some of the most effective ways to form a healthy relationship with money. Here’s a hint — tapping into your natural strengths might just lead you in the right direction.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
